The stash contains items added by mods.
Functions for adding money and items are disabled.
To use them, remove these items, or move them to the container.

Translations.db_load_helper_file_not_found: Could not find DB file generated by the helper mod. Install mod, start server for generate necessary files by mod, and try again. Or disable use of the helper mod in settings

Translations.tab_clearing_from_mods_helper_mod_enable: Enabled use helper mod. In this mode, only the remains of deleted mods are displayed. You can disable the use helper mod in the settings

Make the required changes?

Relative paths to server files will be corrected
Localization files will be reset
The program will automatically restart
